line.text: My tongue-tied muse in manners holds her still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: While comments of your praise richly compiled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Reserve their character with golden quill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And precious phrase by all the Muses filed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I think good thoughts whilst other write good words
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And like unlettered clerk still cry Amen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To every hymn that able spirit affords
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In polished form of well refined pen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hearing you praised I say tis so tis true
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to the most of praise add something more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But that is in my thought whose love to you
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: (Though words come hindmost) holds his rank before
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then others for the breath of words respect
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Me for my dumb thoughts speaking in effect
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
